name: Spielbahn - Demo
description:
Spielbahn demo

Spielbahn is a short sandbox / puzzle game where you build tracks for your racers.
Collect starts to unlock more areas and create cool tracks to unlock more objects.

It's still currently in development, planned to release this year.
Played the game? Let me know what you think!

How to play
Create a track for your racers and unlock the stars from the startrail (press the button on the bottom left). 

Unlock more areas and upgrade your track!

Pop balloons to get more items!

Controls

Scrollwheel: zoom camera in/out

Left click / release: Drag objects and racers, coins

Right click: Rotate objects

Known bugs

- Objects can clip into the sellbox.
- You can softlock yourself at the start (or if you sell everything)
- Game can lag a lot when placing objects.
- Switching between fullscreen / embedded during gameplay creates some weird bugs.
